content: nifty knot bag thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size bag 24 cm length x 18 cm height x 18 cm wide large strap folded in half 24 cm tall x 8 cm wide short strap folded in half 8 cm tall x 8 cm wide designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items materials worsted weight yarn #4 ~400 yards o i have made this bag with red heart super saver stripes in retro stripes & o go red heart super saver in newsprint and peacock 4 5mm hook needle scissors stitch markers 2 green 4 blue 4 red gauge not necessary but your finished size and yardage may vary stitches us terms st -stitch chain -chain skip st -skip stitch single_crochet -single_crochet increase -increase decrease -decrease spike special stitch spike in the next chain space and working around the chain 1 so that the chain is inside your stitch insert hook into stitch directly below the chain space from previous round draw up a loop to the height of your row yarn over pull through both loops o this is just a single_crochet being made longer pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 3 parts bag long strap short strap this pattern is worked in continuous rounds for the bag and row for the straps # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items bag round 1 chain 12 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 9 chain 3sc in last chain working on opposite side of chain single_crochet in next 10 chain 3sc in last chain 26 2 single_crochet 10 *increase* 3 times twice 32 3 single_crochet 10 *increase single_crochet* 3 times twice 38 4 single_crochet 10 *increase 2 single_crochet* 3 times twice 44 5 single_crochet 10 *increase 3 single_crochet* 3 times twice 50 6 single_crochet 10 *increase 4 single_crochet* 3 times twice 56 7 single_crochet 10 *increase 5 single_crochet* 3 times twice 62 8 single_crochet 10 *6 single_crochet increase* 3 times twice 68 9 single_crochet 10 *7 single_crochet increase* 3 times twice 74 10 single_crochet 10 *8 single_crochet increase* 3 times twice 80 11 single_crochet 10 *9 single_crochet increase* 3 times twice 86 12 single_crochet 10 *10 single_crochet increase* 3 times twice 92 13 single_crochet 10 *increase 11 single_crochet* 3 times twice 98 14 single_crochet 10 *increase 12 single_crochet* 3 times twice 104 15 single_crochet 10 *increase 13 single_crochet* 3 times twice 110 designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items 16 decrease single_crochet in each st around 109 17 *single_crochet in next st chain 1 skip st* 64 times single_crochet in next st 55 single_crochet 54 chain 18-height *chain 1 skip st spike in next* around note you will
